sentences.en: BBE: Snow waters become dry with the heat: so do sinners go down into the underworld.
sentences.cn: 和合本: 干旱炎热消没雪水.阴间也如此消没犯罪之辈.

sentences.en: He is the guide to the underworld , granting the dead safe passage.
sentences.cn: 也是黄泉的引导者, 把死者安全地引到黄泉.

sentences.en: He snuck into the underworld, which was a forbidden place to go.
I have heard he has some friends in the underworld.
sentences.cn: 听说他认识一些黑道的朋友.

sentences.en: Like a king in exile, uncrowned in the underworld.
sentences.cn: 像流放中的君王, 被废黜到地狱.

sentences.en: Of or relating to the god Pluto or the underworld; infernal.
sentences.cn: 普路托的,阴间的:普路托的或阴间的;与之有关的; 阴森的.

sentences.en: Save the world from the hordes of the underworld!
sentences.cn: 从来至地狱的游牧部落手中拯救世界!

sentences.en: She was a shady figure in the Dublin underworld.
sentences.cn: 她是都柏林犯罪圈子中的可疑人物.

sentences.en: She was then forced into the underworld.
sentences.cn: 后来尤丽黛丝便被打了地府.

sentences.en: The columnist insinuated — but never actually asserted — that the candidate had underworld ties.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸有一位深受欢迎的专栏作家评论时事.

sentences.en: The death of Santino Corleone sent shock waves through the underworld of the nation.
sentences.cn: 桑迪诺-考利昂之死,在整个地下世界掀起了惊心动魄的波涛.

sentences.en: The underworld is uncovered before him, and Destruction has no veil.
sentences.cn: 在神面前, 阴间显露.灭亡也不得遮掩.

sentences.en: Those who violate the rules of the underworld gang will be punished.
sentences.cn: 违背帮规的人都要受到处罚.

sentences.en: Uh - oh, this looks like an underworld operation.
sentences.cn: 哎呀, 这地方看起来像黑道经营的场所.

sentences.en: While in the underworld, the world's fertility was disrupted.
sentences.cn: 在冥界的时候, 世界的肥沃被中断了.

words.tran_cn: 黑社会；地狱；下层社会；尘世

trans.tran_cn: 阴间，地狱，下流社会，（地球另一面的）对跖点，<古>地球
trans.tran_en: the criminals in a particular place and the criminal activities they are involved in
